body:
Perl has development releases, but they aren't recommended. I added them and kept the latest maintenance release as preferred. See http://www.cpan.org/src/README.html

I also added some older versions of Perl. These are required for another package (PR incoming).

I converted Perl to use separate configure, build, and install phases to match how most of our other packages work. I confirmed that the latest preferred Perl release still builds and passes all tests.
title: Perl: add more versions, add phases
